attributes.action: Review and consider the cessation of road widening schemes and the building of new roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and look at the possibility of using that money to enable more people to work from home by allowing companies a tax break or incentive to do so.  This would reduce the traffic emissions, be more environmentally friendly, and reduce the amount of money spent on the upkeep of the roads as the wear and tear on them would be considerably reduced.
